title: Markets Close at Session Lows: Good Earnings for MSFT, GOOGL & More
text: Odds are firming rapidly that another 25 basis-point (bps) hike to the Fed funds rate a week from tomorrow will set the highest interest rate levels in over 15 years.

title: Meta in the layoffs spotlight ahead of first-quarter results
text: Meta is the latest big-name tech company in the layoffs spotlight, joining Electronic Arts, Amazon, Palantir Technologies, Twilio, Zoom, eBay, Okta, Splunk, PayPal, IBM, SAP, Spotify, Alphabet, Intel, Microsoft, Coinbase, Cisco, Salesforce, HP, Roku, Beyond Meat and Twitter in making job cuts.

title: Time to Buy Meta Platforms Stock with Q1 Earnings Approaching?
text: Off to a stellar start in 2023, Meta Platforms (META) first-quarter earnings are much anticipated with the social media titan set to report on Wednesday, April 26.

title: Tesla Stock, 6 Other Tech Titans Are Responsible For 86% Of S&P 500's 2023 Performance
text: Tesla stock, along with six other Big Techs, account for 86% of the S&P 500's 2023 performance. Four tech titans report earnings this week.

title: Why Are Stocks Down Today?
text: Stocks are well in the red this afternoon ahead of a number of important Big Tech earnings reports. The S&P 500, Dow 30 and Nasdaq Composite are each down by around 1% so far.

title: Will Lower Ad Revenues Hurt Meta Platforms (META) Q1 Earnings?
text: Meta Platforms' (META) first-quarter 2023 earnings are expected to have been affected by the ad revenue business slowdown and adverse macroeconomic conditions.

title: Meta's stock heads for longest losing streak in nearly four years
text: Shares of Meta Platforms Inc. META are off 1.3% in afternoon trading Tuesday and on track to fall for the seventh straight session. That would mark the stock's longest losing streak since a seven-session stretch that ended May 14, 2019, according to Dow Jones Market Data.

title: These fund managers have been holding Microsoft and Meta for decades. Here's why.
text: It's a jittery setup for stocks on Tuesday, with results coming later from Microsoft and Google parent Alphabet, sandwiched by plenty of other big results and consumer confidence data.

title: Inside Meta's scramble to catch up on AI
text: As the summer of 2022 came to a close, Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg gathered his top lieutenants for a five-hour dissection of the company's computing capacity, focused on its ability to do cutting-edge artificial intelligence work, according to a company memo dated Sept. 20 reviewed by Reuters.
